body_html:
i dont think we should really complicate the semantics to make sure the arrays are in sync.
We can keep the semantics simple, which is that if you resize the numpy side, the torch side is not really sharing things...

i dont think we should really complicate the semantics to make sure the arrays are in sync.
We can keep the semantics simple, which is that if you resize the numpy side, the torch side is not really sharing things...
body:
i dont think we should really complicate the semantics to make sure the arrays are in sync.
We can keep the semantics simple, which is that if you resize the numpy side, the torch side is not really sharing things...
